document_data.name: Berellip Xorlarrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Berellip Xorlarrin''' was a [[drow]] priestess of [[House Xorlarrin]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Berellip wore black robes with elaborate designs and spider-shaped charms.
document_data.Personality: She was brash, loud, and stubborn.
document_data.History:
Berellip accompanied the expedition led by [[Ravel Xorlarrin]] to [[Gauntlgrym]] in the {{YearlinkName|1463}}.

But Berellip was killed by Artemis in the {{YearlinkName|1484}}, after she imprisoned him and Dahlia in [[Q'Xorlarrin]] and allowed them to be tortured.
document_data.Relationships: Berellip was the daughter of [[Matron Mother]] [[Zeerith Q'Xorlarrin]].
